Diabetes is a condition that requires daily monitoring and tracking of various aspects such as blood glucose levels, insulin dosages, medication schedules, exercise routine, and food intake.
This is especially true if you have limited dexterity or vision.
For instance, you have to keep a log of your daily blood glucose readings, insulin dosages, food intake, and any other vital signs that may affect diabetes management.
